django-pyodbc development news.

== SVN revision 79 ==

Backend-specific setting `DATABASE_COLLATE` has been renamed to `DATABASE_COLLATION` to be have a more correct spelling and to be consistent with Django's [http://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/ref/settings/#test-database-collation `TEST_DATABASE_COLLATION`] setting.

== SVN revision 66 ==

The backend module name has been changed in a backwards incompatible way, you will need to change your `DATABASE_ENGINE` setting from `'mssql'` to `'sql_server.pyodbc'`.

== SVN revision 30 ==

Updated code to be compatible with Django as of [http://code.djangoproject.com/changeset/8426 r8426].

Also, works has been started to merge fixes and changes from a development branch to trunk, to be in good shape to accompany the imminent Django 1.0 release.
